Official Sass Web Site
Read more about Sass at the official Sass web site:

Install Sass
There are several ways to install Sass in your system. There are many 
applications that will get you up and running with Sass in a few minutes for 
Mac, Windows, and Linux. Some of these are free, but some are paid apps.
You can read more about them here:
sass-lang.com/install
